Title: Periprosthetic joint infection in total hip arthroplasty: Prevention and management
Abstract: © 2015 MA Healthcare Ltd.Periprosthetic joint infection is a devastating complication. Orthopaedic surgeons must prevent, anticipate, rapidly diagnose and effectively manage such patients in the multidisciplinary setting. This review discusses current strategies in the management of these patients following total hip arthroplasty.
